long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# SideNote - Your Smart Note-Taking Assistant

## Description
SideNote is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you save and organize web content efficiently. With SideNote, you can quickly capture URLs, take notes, and save important information from any webpage using the convenient side panel interface.

## Key Features
- **Quick URL Saving**: Save any webpage with rich metadata including title, description, and preview image
- **Smart Note-Taking**: Take notes while browsing without leaving your current page
- **Side Panel Integration**: Access your saved content instantly from any tab
- **Keyboard Shortcuts**: Use Shift + Enter to quickly save your notes
- **Context Menu Integration**: Right-click to save pages or generate AI summaries
- **Rich Preview**: View webpage previews with metadata before saving

## How to Use
1. **Quick Save**:
   - Click the extension icon to open the side panel
   - Paste a URL or type your note
   - Press Shift + Enter or click "Add Note" to save

2. **Context Menu Save**:
   - Right-click on any webpage
   - Select "Save this URL to SideNote" to save the current page
   - Choose "Summarize (with AI) and save" to create an AI-generated summary

3. **Managing Notes**:
   - Click any note to view full details
   - Right-click on notes for additional options (edit, delete)
   - Use the refresh button to sync your notes

## Privacy Note
All your notes are stored locally in your browser. The extension only accesses webpage content when explicitly requested to save or summarize a page.
